description: Use to get the current status of devices registered on SageMaker Edge Manager.

parameters.name: AgentMetrics
parameters.description: For internal use. Returns a list of SageMaker Edge Manager agent operating metrics. (dict) --- Information required for edge device metrics. Dimension (string) --- The dimension of metrics published. MetricName (string) --- Returns the name of the metric. Value (float) --- Returns the value of the metric. Timestamp (datetime) --- Timestamp of when the metric was requested.

nested_params.name: Dimension
nested_params.description: The dimension of metrics published.

nested_params.name: MetricName
nested_params.description: Returns the name of the metric.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: Returns the value of the metric.

nested_params.name: Timestamp
nested_params.description: Timestamp of when the metric was requested.

parameters.name: Models
parameters.description: Returns a list of models deployed on the the device. (dict) --- Information about a model deployed on an edge device that is registered with SageMaker Edge Manager. ModelName (string) --- The name of the model. ModelVersion (string) --- The version of the model. LatestSampleTime (datetime) --- The timestamp of the last data sample taken. LatestInference (datetime) --- The timestamp of the last inference that was made. ModelMetrics (list) --- Information required for model metrics. (dict) --- Information required for edge device metrics. Dimension (string) --- The dimension of metrics published. MetricName (string) --- Returns the name of the metric. Value (float) --- Returns the value of the metric. Timestamp (datetime) --- Timestamp of when the metric was requested.

nested_params.name: ModelName
nested_params.description: The name of the model.

nested_params.name: ModelVersion
nested_params.description: The version of the model.

nested_params.name: LatestSampleTime
nested_params.description: The timestamp of the last data sample taken.

nested_params.name: LatestInference
nested_params.description: The timestamp of the last inference that was made.

nested_params.name: ModelMetrics
nested_params.description: Information required for model metrics.

nested_params.name: Dimension
nested_params.description: The dimension of metrics published.

nested_params.name: MetricName
nested_params.description: Returns the name of the metric.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: Returns the value of the metric.

nested_params.name: Timestamp
nested_params.description: Timestamp of when the metric was requested.

parameters.name: AgentVersion
parameters.description: Returns the version of the agent.

parameters.name: DeviceName
parameters.description: The unique name of the device.

parameters.name: DeviceFleetName
parameters.description: The name of the fleet that the device belongs to.

parameters.name: DeploymentResult
parameters.description: Returns the result of a deployment on the device. DeploymentName (string) --- The name and unique ID of the deployment. DeploymentStatus (string) --- Returns the bucket error code. DeploymentStatusMessage (string) --- Returns the detailed error message. DeploymentStartTime (datetime) --- The timestamp of when the deployment was started on the agent. DeploymentEndTime (datetime) --- The timestamp of when the deployment was ended, and the agent got the deployment results. DeploymentModels (list) --- Returns a list of models deployed on the agent. (dict) --- ModelHandle (string) --- The unique handle of the model. ModelName (string) --- The name of the model. ModelVersion (string) --- The version of the model. DesiredState (string) --- The desired state of the model. State (string) --- Returns the current state of the model. Status (string) --- Returns the deployment status of the model. StatusReason (string) --- Returns the error message for the deployment status result. RollbackFailureReason (string) --- Returns the error message if there is a rollback.

nested_params.name: DeploymentName
nested_params.description: The name and unique ID of the deployment.

nested_params.name: DeploymentStatus
nested_params.description: Returns the bucket error code.

nested_params.name: DeploymentStatusMessage
nested_params.description: Returns the detailed error message.

nested_params.name: DeploymentStartTime
nested_params.description: The timestamp of when the deployment was started on the agent.

nested_params.name: DeploymentEndTime
nested_params.description: The timestamp of when the deployment was ended, and the agent got the deployment results.

nested_params.name: DeploymentModels
nested_params.description: Returns a list of models deployed on the agent.

nested_params.name: ModelHandle
nested_params.description: The unique handle of the model.

nested_params.name: ModelName
nested_params.description: The name of the model.

nested_params.name: ModelVersion
nested_params.description: The version of the model.

nested_params.name: DesiredState
nested_params.description: The desired state of the model.

nested_params.name: State
nested_params.description: Returns the current state of the model.

nested_params.name: Status
nested_params.description: Returns the deployment status of the model.

nested_params.name: StatusReason
nested_params.description: Returns the error message for the deployment status result.

nested_params.name: RollbackFailureReason
nested_params.description: Returns the error message if there is a rollback.
